DataElement.preferredName: Personal Medical History CDR Entry Completed By Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A textual description of the signature of the person who transcribed the data from a form into the Comprehensive Data Resource (CDR).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Personal Medical History CDR Entry Completed By
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies._A directive to add the signature of the individual completing the Comprehensive Data Resource (CDR).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.
